TopicTitle: Ideas on how to transport a rover to the Mun or Minimus

Articles.Content: So, I got a nice little rover designed, but I am failing hard at constructing a transport to get it to MUN or Minimus. Anybody have some designs they wouldn't mind sharing?
This thread has a bunch of ideas on getting rovers places

Thank you!

I actually tried to search this before posting, but didn't use "landing" in any of my searches.
